verses.name: Joshua 15:15
verses.text: And he went up thence to the inhabitants of Debir: and the name of Debir before was Kirjath–sepher.

verses.name: Joshua 15:16
verses.text: And Caleb said, He that smiteth Kirjath–sepher, and taketh it, to him will I give Achsah my daughter to wife.

verses.name: Joshua 15:17
verses.text: And Othniel the son of Kenaz, the brother of Caleb, took it: and he gave him Achsah his daughter to wife.

verses.name: Joshua 15:18
verses.text: And it came to pass, as she came unto him, that she moved him to ask of her father a field: and she lighted off her ass; and Caleb said unto her, What wouldest thou?
